title: Keep Paws Protected
description: Use paw balm before walks and clean paws after to remove ice-melting chemicals.

title: Maintain Proper Hydration
description: Ensure fresh water is always available. Pets can dehydrate in winter too!

title: Adjust Diet Accordingly
description: Outdoor pets may need more calories, while indoor pets may need less.

title: Limit Outdoor Time
description: Watch for signs of discomfort like shivering, whining, or reluctance to walk.
